Name: The Experiment
About the game: This game is a chapter based indie horror game, where you try to find your Missing friend! This game will have Some patches and updates with new chapters. Maybe some Dlc's if you buy this early, your in for a treat, as I said its gonna get updated. With every update comes a new chapter, so be ready. one day you might just find your friend. This game includes: A lever, food, enemy's, jumpscare's, music, menu, chapters, walking, a hut, a lab, skinless guys, fire, caves (soon), smoke, fog, chase scene and much more! In the first Chapter you start as a Nightguard that have chosen to work at a Laboratory, Keeping watch on the experiment While being supervised by the Head Scientist. In the Second Chapter you switch to the protagonist John, You get a call from your friend Billy. saying he needs your help with something at his cabin, John then drives to the cabin expecting Billy there but finds something else... The third chapter will be out soon..... The fourth chapter will be out soon..... The fifth chapter will be out soon..... if this game does well I will focus on making the game better in every aspect I can, For now it is a hobby but if I earn enough money to support myself. I will make this my full time job! I'm gonna stop spoiling the entire game and let you enjoy it for yourself!
